entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then light late in the afternoon.
